Enter your Insightly API key. You can fi: 输入您Insightly API 密钥。您可以在用户设置 > API 密钥下的Insightly 帐户中找到这个密钥。
Create a new record in a specified Insig: 在指定的Insight对象中创建新记录 (联系人、Lead、商业机会等)
Update an existing record's fields in a: 在指定的 Insightly 对象中更新已有记录的字段
Get a record by ID from a specified Insi: 从指定的Insight对象获取记录
Delete a record by ID from a specified I: 从指定的 Insightly 对象中删除记录
Find records in a specified Insightly ob: 在指定的Insight对象中查找记录
Your Insightly pod (e.g., \"na1\", \"eu1: Your Insightly pod (e.g., "na1", "eu1"). Find this in your API URL: https://api.{pod}.insightly.com
Select the type of record to create: 选择要创建的记录类型
Select the type of object that contains: 选择包含您想要更新记录的对象类型
Select the type of record to retrieve: 选择要检索的记录类型
Select the type of record to delete: 选择要删除的记录类型
Select the type of records to find: 选择要查找的记录类型
Fires when a new record is created in In: 在 Insightly 中创建新记录时发生火灾(需要 webhook 设置)
Fires when an existing record is updated: 当已有记录在Insighty更新时发生火灾(需要 webhook 设置)
Fires when a record is deleted from Insi: 当记录被从洞察中删除时发生火灾。
The type of Insightly object to monitor: 用于监视新记录的Insight对象类型
\n**Webhook URL:**\n```text\n{{webhookUr:
**Webhook URL:**
```text
{{webhookUrl}}
```
**Instructions:**
1.  Go to **System Settings > Workflow Automation** in your Insightly account.
2.  Create a new Workflow Process for the desired **Object Type**.
3.  Set the trigger to **"When a record is created"**.
4.  Under "Immediate Actions," add a new action and select **"Add New Webhook"**.
5.  Paste the webhook URL above into the **URI** field and save the workflow.
The type of Insightly object to monitor: 要监视更新的Insight对象类型
\n**Webhook URL:**\n```text\n{{webhookUr:
**Webhook URL:**
```text
{{webhookUrl}}
```
**Instructions:**
1.  Go to **System Settings > Workflow Automation** in your Insightly account.
2.  Create a new Workflow Process for the desired **Object Type**.
3.  Set the trigger to **"When a record is created and when a record is edited"**.
4.  Under "Immediate Actions," add a new action and select **"Add New Webhook"**.
5.  Paste the webhook URL above into the **URI** field and save the workflow.
The type of Insightly object to monitor: 要监视删除的Insight对象类型
